title: Inspiration Rune Idea, Doublecast
body:
What do you guys think of this idea for an Inspiration Rune, Doublecast, at the beginning of the match select Q, W, E, R as a double-cast able ability, this ability can be cast twice for the rest of the game, 1st cast starts the cooldown and 2nd cast can be used anytime in between that or not at all. Downsides, the cooldown for the ability is doubled and not affected by CD reduction or levels in that ability. Pro sides, can be used for sick outplays and the 2nd cast does not require any mana. Any questions?

Edit 1 - Some abilities such as {{champion:26}} W's would be locked, for overpowered use.

Edit 2 - Most abilities will have some sort of debuff to prevent major problems.

So you have double the cd but can cast it twice.
The only upside is being able to cast the 2nd cast whenever you want during the active cooldown.
However, to do this you loose out on a LOT of cooldown, if you choose something like Blitz Q, Camille E or Zoe E plus the 2nd cast is going to be weaker?
And what happens if I pick let's say Ahri Q. The cooldown will be somewhere around 16 to 20 seconds I think so let's just go with 20. Can I now cast Q, wait for 19.5 seconds, cast Q again, wait for the last .5 seconds, cast Q again, with that starting the cd again and cast Q a third time?

I really need an explanation for the cooldown thing.
